description: From a series of five lithographs for Der Lebende Leichnam (The Living Corpse) by Leo Tolstoy, published by Karl Lang Verlag in Darmstadt, 1919; figure in bottom center of image dressed in black and hunched over a table with his fingers grasping the sides of the table and his chin resting on the corner of the table
inscription: LL in pencil, below image: 2) | LL of sheet, in pencil: Privat-exemplar. | LRC of sheet, in pencil: E.69 | LRC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 786
portfolio: From Plate 2 from Der Lebende Leichnam (The Living Corpse), Leo Tolstoy, published by Karl Lang Verlag in Darmstadt, 1919
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 19
title: Fedja Before Maschas's Visit, Plate 2 from Der Lebende Leichnam (The Living Corpse)
